publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1165# Alasdair Morgan: Shirley McKie-That the Parliament notes that Strathclyde Police has been granted a court order entitling it to seek recovery of legal expenses of £13,000 from Shirley McKie following unsuccessful legal action raised by her against the board; recognises that, while Strathclyde Police may be legally entitled to seek recovery of this sum, there is no moral case for it to do so following the acquittal of Shirley McKie on a charge of perjury in the High Court of Justiciary, and considers that Strathclyde Police should abandon further attempts to recover this sum. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop*

S2M-1165*#* Alasdair Morgan: Shirley McKie-That the Parliament notes that Strathclyde Joint Police Board has been granted a court order entitling it to seek recovery of legal expenses of £13,000 from Shirley McKie following unsuccessful legal action raised by her against the board; recognises that, while Strathclyde Joint Police Board may be legally entitled to seek recovery of this sum, there is no moral case for it to do so following the acquittal of Shirley McKie on a charge of perjury in the High Court of Justiciary, and *considers that* the board *should* abandon further attempts to recover this sum. Supported by: Ms Sandra White*, Christine Grahame*

S2M-1165# Shirley McKie (lodged on 14 April 2004) Stewart Stevenson*, Fergus Ewing*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Richard Lochhead*, Brian Adam*, Mike Pringle*, Rob Gibson*, Chris Ballance*, Jim Mather*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Linda Fabiani*, Tommy Sheridan*, Phil Gallie*, Tricia Marwick*
S2M-1165# Shirley McKie (lodged on 14 April 2004) Alex Neil*, Dennis Canavan*, Campbell Martin*
S2M-1165# Shirley McKie (lodged on 14 April 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Adam Ingram*, John Swinburne*, Michael Matheson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-1165# Shirley McKie (lodged on 14 April 2004) Robin Harper*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1165# Shirley McKie (lodged on 14 April 2004) Frances Curran*
S2M-1165# Shirley McKie (lodged on 14 April 2004) Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-1165# Shirley McKie (lodged on 14 April 2004) Shiona Baird*
S2M-1165# Shirley McKie (lodged on 14 April 2004) Mark Ballard*
